SELECT i.issu_no , i.prjt_no , i.buss_no , i.memb_id , i.issu_ttl , i.issu_cntn , i.issu_knd , i.issu_rank , i.issu_st , i.issu_dt , p.prjt_nm , b.buss_nm , memb.memb_nm FROM issue i, project p, business b, member memb WHERE i.buss_no = b.buss_no AND b.prjt_no = p.prjt_no AND memb.memb_id = i.memb_id AND i.buss_no = #{bussNo}
AND memb_nm LIKE '%' || #{searchBI} || '%'
AND issu_ttl LIKE '%' || #{searchBI} || '%'
AND (memb_nm LIKE '%' || #{searchBI} || '%' OR issu_ttl LIKE '%' || #{searchBI} || '%' )
ORDER BY issu_dt DESC

SELECT i.issu_no , i.prjt_no , i.buss_no , i.memb_id , i.issu_ttl , i.issu_cntn , i.issu_knd , i.issu_rank , i.issu_st , i.issu_dt , p.prjt_nm , b.buss_nm , memb.memb_nm FROM issue i, project p, business b, member memb WHERE i.buss_no = b.buss_no(+) AND b.prjt_no = p.prjt_no(+) AND memb.memb_id = i.memb_id AND i.prjt_no = #{prjtNo}
AND memb_nm LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND issu_ttl LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND buss_nm LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND (memb_nm LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' OR issu_ttl LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' OR buss_nm LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%')
ORDER BY issu_dt DESC

SELECT i.issu_no , i.prjt_no , i.buss_no , i.memb_id , i.issu_ttl , i.issu_cntn , i.issu_knd , i.issu_rank , i.issu_st , i.issu_dt , p.prjt_nm , b.buss_nm , p.co_cd , memb.memb_nm FROM issue i, project p, business b, member memb WHERE i.buss_no = b.buss_no AND b.prjt_no = p.prjt_no AND i.memb_id = memb.memb_id AND p.co_cd = #{coCd} AND p.prjt_pubcyn = '0F1'
AND memb_nm LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND issu_ttl LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND buss_nm LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND prjt_nm LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND (memb_nm LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' OR issu_ttl LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' OR buss_nm LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' OR prjt_nm LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%')
ORDER BY issu_dt DESC
SELECT p.prjt_nm, i.memb_id , i.issu_dt, i.issu_st FROM project p , issue i WHERE p.prjt_no = i.prjt_no

SELECT i.issu_no , i.prjt_no , i.buss_no , i.memb_id , i.issu_ttl , i.issu_cntn , i.issu_knd , i.issu_rank , i.issu_st , i.issu_dt , m.memb_nm FROM issue i, member m WHERE i.memb_id = m.memb_id AND issu_no = #{issuNo}

SELECT issu_no , prjt_no , memb_nm , issu_ttl , CASE issu_knd WHEN '0L1' THEN '버그' WHEN '0L2' THEN '개선사항' WHEN '0L3' THEN '새기능' WHEN '0L4' THEN '업무' END AS issu_knd , CASE issu_st WHEN '0E1' THEN '해결' WHEN '0E2' THEN '미해결' WHEN '0E3' THEN '해결불가' END AS issu_st , issu_dt FROM issue i LEFT JOIN member m ON i.memb_id = m.memb_id
ORDER BY issu_no DESC
